data.event: The first settlement was developed in 1793 by Gerrit Boon in Barneveldt, as an agent of the Holland Land Company.

event.title: went back to Holland after a few years

data.event: Boon went back to Holland after a few years.
The town was formed in 1797 from the Town of Schuyler (in Herkimer County, New York).

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2005

data.event: The Wethersfield Stone Schoolhouse was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2005.
